title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Personnel to Key Administration Post – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
February 27, 2018
The following individual to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Federal Prison Industries (Department of Defense Representative)The following individual to be a Member of the President’s Board of Advisors on Historically Black Colleges and Universities and upon appointment designate him ChairmanThe following individual to be a Member of the Frederick Douglass Bicentennial Commission (Maryland Governor’s Rep)The following individuals to be Members of the board of visitors to the United States Naval Academy
